revised_title: Obituary of James Yates and George Grote
tldr: This article is an obituary for James Yates and George Grote, two notable figures in science and literature. James Yates was a minister, geologist, and supporter of the temperance movement, while George Grote was a banker, classical scholar, and historian. Both men made significant contributions to their respective fields and were well-respected in their communities.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biography
